Texto: 
quadrantanopia
steroids
• enlarged right optic nerve to level of chiasm
• the abnormal nerve enhances with contrast
• negative brain mri (no cerebral lesions)
right sided optic neuritis
• adem
• ms
• devic disease (neuromyelitis optica)
• lyme disease
• sarcoidosis
• optic nerve glioma
15 y.o. girl with c/o of blurred vision for 1 week
